caseInsensitiveSecond: «Wonkomaonk» nashpe nehenwonche nunnutcheg nen Paul. «Mequontamꝏ̄k» ‹nukkishpissuongash›. Kitteamonteanittuonk kꝏ̄wetomukꝏ̄. Amen.
rawKJV: The salutation by the hand of me Paul. Remember my bonds. Grace be with you. Amen.
grebrew: Ὁ ἀσπασμὸς τῇ ἐμῇ χειρὶ Παύλου. Μνημονεύετέ μου τῶν δεσμῶν. Ἡ χάρις μεθʼ ὑμῶν. Ἀμήν.
